bibl.title: Two More Fragments of the Vienna Jannes and Jambres.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Edition of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 180 and 28249, two additional fragments of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29456 + 29828 (= M.-P.3 2640.2; van Haelst 1068-1069; LDAB 8118; 5467). On the recto, hermetic text, labeled by the first editor under ""Gnostica""; on the verso, the apocryphon Jannes and Jambres. Third century AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Albert Pietersma, Two More Fragments of the Vienna Jannes and Jambres.

Edition of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 180 and 28249, two additional fragments of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29456 + 29828 (= M.-P.3 2640.2; van Haelst 1068-1069; LDAB 8118; 5467). On the recto, hermetic text, labeled by the first editor under ""Gnostica""; on the verso, the apocryphon Jannes and Jambres. Third century AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
